alert.note: Alert for Door; Kewaunee; Manitowoc (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 5:36PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...AREAS OF DENSE FOG WILL IMPACT THE LAKE MICHIGAN SHORELINE THIS EVENING... Areas of dense fog, with visibilities of 1/4 mile or less, will expand north along the Lake Michigan shoreline during the late afternoon and early evening. Travel may be impacted on Interstate 43 from Sheboygan to Manitowoc, Highway 42 from Two Rivers to Algoma, and eventually Highway 57 from Jacksonport to Gills Rock. The dense fog is expected to move offshore by late evening, as winds turn south-southwest. Motorists traveling near the Lake Michigan shoreline can expect rapidly changing and poor visibilities at times. Remember to turn on your low-beam headlights, slow down, and keep a safe distance between you and the car in front of you.
